data.title: Writing and Internal Exile in Eastern Europe: The Example of Imre Kertész
data.meta_description: Writing and Internal Exile in Eastern Europe: The Example of Imre Kertész was published in The Exile and Return of Writers from East-Central Europe on page 368.
data.text:
Suleiman, Susan Rubin. "Writing and Internal Exile in Eastern Europe: The Example of Imre Kertész".
